body: OpDataset OpDataset(dataset:torch.utils.data.dataset.Dataset, ops:List[fastestimator.op.numpyop.numpyop.NumpyOp], mode:str) -> None A wrapper for datasets which allows operators to be applied to them in a pipeline. This class should not be directly instantiated by the end user. The fe.Pipeline will automatically wrap datasetswithin an Op dataset as needed. Args: dataset : The base dataset to wrap. ops : A list of ops to be applied after the base dataset getitem is invoked. mode : What mode the system is currently running in ('train', 'eval', 'test', or 'infer').
title: OpDataset
